You woke up in a mysterious lab, where excatly are you?
Your Name is [INSERT SUBJECT'S NAME HERE] and you need to find a way to complete all "19" test (levels) in [INSERT LOCATION HERE] with a help with the portal gun and you wont be able to survive without the portal gun.

plus there's also challenging maps and advance chamber maps too, think you be able to do the challenge?

This is a puzzle game made by steam and it's gonna keep you busy for hours and make sure you are thinking with portals

The game maybe short but if you looking for achievements then you may have a long time

Don't forget to buy Portal 2 as well, meet me again for my next review which is Portal 2!

When i first played this game, im like, well great, a puzzle game, cant be that fun, but this game is pretty amazing, i never knew a puzzle game can be this fun, basiually the whole game is you're trapped in a testing facility and you're trying to find your way out, or beat the testing so you can earn cake,you have a special gun that shoots two portals, one entrance one exit and have to find your way to your destination. can you finish the game and get some cake?
Puzzle muito interessante: gráficos interessantes, gameplay inovador e uma história, mesmo que muito simples, intrigante. Uma pena ter um tempo total de jogo muito curto.
非常非常棒的游戏！有点FPS类游戏，但是各种智商考验啊，不过不要怕，多想一会儿就能想出来，而且有简体中文。美中不足主线剧情好短啊，我3个小时就结束了，虽然有创意工坊。。可是没法听到GLaDOS的腹黑吐槽了。ps:游戏结束时的主题曲相当好听。

Portal.

O que falar desse jogo, eu me pergunto.

É um Game Genial, todos sabemos, todos ouvimos falar. Mas portal é bem mais do que isso. Portal é a prova que para um jogo ser bom, ele não precisa ser violento, ou ter controles complicados, ou qualquer coisa desse tipo. Portal, pra mim, acima de tudo se tranformou num símbolo.

O Game é simples. Crie portais. Azul, e Laranja, para completar as fases. Simples assim. Não temos Muitos personagens (2 na verdade) e desses 2; um é mudo, deixando TUDO por conta de um. GLaDOS, e apesar disso, o jogo consegue ser Genial. O game é curto. Na verdade, exatamente o tanto que deveria ser. Quando zerar o jogo, você ficará com toda a certeza com um gostinho de "Quero mais".

Portal, como eu disse, é um jogo simples, com uma trama simples, com um humor simples (e negro). E mesmo apesar disso, consegue ser um game Genial, de Puzzle (Gênero que eu nem gosto tanto), que consegue simbolisar o que grande parte dos desenvolvedores Hoje não enxerga. Para um jogo ser bom, apenas precisa ter um pouco de criatividade (Goat Simulator tá aí pra não me deixar mentir.)

Darei pro jogo um 9.5/10 porque eu não sou muito fã do jogo de Puzzle.
Einfach nur der Hammer! Wer Portal und Portal 2 nicht gezockt hat sollte das schnellstens nachholen. Zurecht ein legendärer Titel.

Absolutely amazing, good gameplay, and story. Graphics are good for its time definitely worth getting. The only downside is it's rather short. This is a first person strategy game. If you dont like having to think in a game, then dont bother getting portal. Personally i think its a must buy. My score 9.5/10 due to it being short, but dont let thant keep you away from playing an exellent game.

A modern classic. Played it twice on Xbox and am on my third playthrough at the time of this review. The levels are great GLADOS is awesome. The sequel is even better, but this still holds up on it's own.
Classic game which is one of a kind. Simplistic but yet so complex.

Pretty fantastic little game. Definitely a must buy and play.
My rating: 9/10

This game is about science, puzzles, portals, and trying to figure out what the heck is going on. I would say more, but that would ruin this gem. 

Pros: Fun puzzles, compelling gameplay, and Glados is a surprisingly well developed "character" and pretty funny too. 
Cons: The main game is too short. :( I was enjoying myself so much and then it was over. I guess thats what Portal 2 is for though. 

Finally:
WHERE THE HECK IS MY CAKE?!?!?
(Play the game. You'll get it.)

Portal-отличная игра для любителей поломать голову. Невероятная атмосфера, отличный сюжет, чёрный юмор, "The cake is a lie", и конечно же GLaDOS...даже титры в этой игре-ГЕНИАЛЬНЫ. Это игра точно сможет напрячь ваш мозг, но успокоить душу.

Portal is a creative interactive experience, it has a dark background story and at it's entirety the full game serves as an analogy for a hidden world, that lets you know things are not as they appear to be.
That beign said, the reason why i don't recommend Portal is because it's a "one time only" kinda game, if you played this game once you played it twice, heck maybe even more than that.
I'm not basing my score or my judgment on games, plain simply because they don't surprise me anymore, but portal it's a linear game in the negative way, with the story aggraviating in several different ways the sweet and joyful experience that it is to actually play the game.

Overall i guess my complain really comes with the pacing of the game, it might seem redundant at first, but even the first puzzles that seem to be mind bending to some, for me they were teaching tools to complete the game, overall i didn't like it, even then i can say it's not a bad game by any means.

By the way if YOU have Portal or you bought it and enjoyed playing it I HIGHLY RECOMMEND you to get PORTAL 2!!!!!!
